mapper.select: select rev.*,pb.* from review as rev join product_board pb on rev.pno = pb.pno where rev.rno=#{rno};
select filename as fn from review_attach where rno=#{rno};
select ra.rno,filename as fn from review_attach ra join review r on ra.rno=r.rno where r.pno=#{pno};

select * from ( select R.* , @rownum:=@rownum+1 as rownum from ( select r.pno,r.rno, r.content, r.rate , r.regdate , r.writer ,r.rev_subject , (select count(helpfulUserId) from helpful where rno = r.rno) as helpful,(select count(*) from review where writer= r.writer) as urCnt from review r left join helpful h on (r.rno = h.rno) join (select @rownum:=0) as rn where content like '%%' and r.pno = #{pno} group by r.rno ) as R order by R.rno desc) as C
where rownum >(#{cri.pageNum}-1) * #{cri.amount} and rownum<= #{cri.amount} * #{cri.pageNum}
select ra.rno,ra.filename as fn from review r left join review_attach ra on r.rno=ra.rno where writer=#{uname};
select count(*) from review where writer = #{wirter}
select count(*) from review where pno = #{pno}
select count(*) as reviewCnt , sum(helpful) as helpful from review where writer = #{writer};
mapper.update: update review set helpful = helpful-1 where rno = #{rno}
